com.chbase

Class DefaultPrivateKeyStore

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.chbase.DefaultPrivateKeyStore
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PrivateKeyStore

    public class DefaultPrivateKeyStore
extends java.lang.Object
implements PrivateKeyStore
    An implementation of PrivateKeyStore which delegates to the Java keystore. The keystore is loaded from the classpath and uses the provided key alias and password to obtain the private key.

    Generate a private/public key pair with the keytool: keytool -genkey -keyalg RSA -keysize 1024 -keystore <filename> -alias <alias>

    Export the public certificate with: keytool -export -alias <alias> -keystore <filename>

    The thumbprint is generated with a SHA1 digest of the binary public key certificate.
